attributes.title: Remember That Everything Is Paramashiva And Celebrate Life! || 03 October 2020
attributes.description:
3 OCTOBER 2020 

*PARAMASHIVA’S MESSAGE DIRECTLY FROM KAILASA:

*வெளிச்செல்வதொன்று மன வெளிக்கு இல்லை... ஏனெனில் வெளி என்று மனம் விளிக்கும் எல்லாமே பரவெளிக்கு வெளியில் இல்லாததால்... வெளி என்றும் உள் என்றும் மனம் உரைத்தலும் உயங்களும் உய்த்தலும் வெளியும் உள்ளும் இலாத சிவபர பரம்பொருளின்... சிவபர பரம்பொருளின் பர வெளியே எனும் உண்மையை நினைந்து உன்னுள் மகிழ்ந்திரு... ஆனந்தித்து இருக்கும் ஆனந்த சுகபோத ஞானத்து தானாய் மலர்ந்து தன்மயானந்தத்தோடு சின்மயானந்த பரம்பொருளாய் பரமசிவம் இருப்பன்...

*BECAUSE THERE IS NO OUTSIDE AND INSIDE, EVEN WHAT MIND THINKS AS GOING OUTSIDE IS NOT OUTSIDE THE PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF; THERE IS NOTHING CALLED MIND GOING OUTSIDE. THERE IS NOTHING CALLED OUTSIDE MEANS THERE IS NOTHING CALLED INSIDE. SO THE IDEA OF OUTSIDE AND INSIDE ONLY NEEDS TO BE RENOUNCED AND RELAXED.

*WHETHER YOU ARE GOING OUT OR GOING IN, YOU ARE IN PARAMASHIVA. NOTHING TO GO OUT, NOTHING TO GO IN, NOTHING TO RENOUNCE, NOTHING TO ENJOY, NOTHING TO CHERISH, NOTHING TO HATE.

*WHAT YOU CHERISH OR WHAT YOU HATE OR WHAT YOU ARE, OR WHAT YOU ARE GOING IN, OR WHAT YOU ARE GOING OUT, EVERYTHING IS PARAMASHIVA.

*CELEBRATE EVERYTHING.

*THAT CLARITY WILL MAKE YOU FEEL PARAMASHIVA.

*NEITHER YOU NEED TO REMEMBER ‘SHIVAYA NAMAHA’ NOR ‘PARAMASHIVOHAM’. THERE IS ONLY ONE: PARAMASHIVA, PARAMASHIVA, PARAMASHIVA.

*WHETHER YOUR MIND IS GOING IN OR OUT OR STAYING OR BORED OR SEDUCED OR GOING TO SEDUCE OTHERS, WHETHER YOU ARE IN MOHA, ROHA, BHOGA OR TYAGA, IT IS ONLY PARAMASHIVA.

*EVERYTHING - MOVEMENT OR NO MOVEMENT, BEING, DOING, ACTING, TASTING, EVERYTHING IS PURE PARAMASHIVA. ALL THE RIGHT, WRONG, GOOD, BAD YOU LEARNT IS UNNECESSARY SACREDNESS ASSOCIATED TO MAN-MADE LAWS. MAN-MADE LAWS IS ONLY FOR MAKING IT EASY TO LIVE IN A COUNTRY. THERE IS NOTHING SACRED OR PHILOSOPHICAL NOR ‘EXISTENTIAL REALITY’ ABOUT IT. SO THERE IS NO COSMIC SANCTION REQUIRED FOR IT.

*NOTHING IS GOOD, NOTHING IS BAD, NOTHING IS RIGHT, NOTHING IS WRONG. THERE IS NO SUCH THING CALLED BONDAGE. WHETHER IT IS GOING OUT OR GOING IN, EVERYWHERE YOUR MIND GOES, OR ANYTHING FROM WHICH YOU UNCLUTCH, EVERYTHING IS PARAMASHIVA.

*REMEMBER THIS AND CELEBRATE LIFE!

*EVERYTHING IS PARAMASHIVA. REMEMBER THIS AND CELEBRATE LIFE!

*THE SUPERCONSCIOUS PRINCIPLE OF PARAMASHIVA IS: SHUDDHADVAITA SATYA JNANA NITHYANANDA SVABHAVA.

*NOW I AM INITIATING ALL OF YOU AND BLESSING ALL OF YOU TO MANIFEST THIS SUPERCONSCIOUSNESS OF PARAMASHIVA. ALL YOU NEED TO DO IS DO VAKYARTHA SADHAS INTENSELY. INTENSE VAKYARTHA SADHAS WILL MAKE YOU FREE FROM ALL WHAT YOU CALL AS BONDAGE. IT WILL MAKE YOU MANIFEST PARAMASHIVATVA - SCIENCE OF PARAMASHIVA.

*I BLESS YOU ALL.

*WE WILL HAVE PARAMASHIVA GANA SESSION NEXT.

*THESE TRUTHS WHICH I AM REVEALING ARE THE ULTIMATE TRUTHS WHICH WILL BECOME POWER IN YOU BY CONSTANTLY DRILLING YOU WITH THESE TRUTHS THROUGH VAKYARTHA SADHAS, AND BY LISTENING TO VARIOUS SATSANGS AND INTERNALIZING THESE GREAT TRUTHS.

*SIT FOR FEW MINUTES. I WILL PUT THIS INITIATION INTO YOU POWERFULLY.

*OM NITHYANANDA PARAMASHIVOHAM.

*PARAMASHIVA, PARAMASHIVA...
